title: Virgin Islands National Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Virgin Islands National Park Open year-round 24 hours a day. Park Visitor Center Open daily from 8 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Closed Thanksgiving DayClosed Christmas DayTrunk BayFacilities open 8 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.Lifeguards on duty from 9:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Snack bar/souvenir shop open from 9:00 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. Cinnamon Bay CampgroundThe front desk is open from 8:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m. Quiet hours are from 10:00 p.m. until 7:00 a.m. For more information visit their web site www.cinnamonbay.com,or call 1-800-539-9998, (340) 776-6330
